channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: In the state of Madhya Pradesh
item.description: In the state of Madhya Pradesh, Adani Group has already invested about INR 18,250 crore and created 12,000 jobs across sectors. The Adani Group plans to set up a 2 MTPA cement grinding unit in Guna. The Adani Group is also going to develop a state-of-the-art propellant production facility at Shivpuri. These two projects would result in an investment of INR 3500 crore and create over 3500 direct and indirect jobs: Karan Adani

item.title: #WATCH | Telangana: BRS leader
item.description: #WATCH | Telangana: BRS leader #KKavitha reaches Hyderabad; receives a warm welcome from party leaders and workers. She was released from Tihar Jail after she was granted bail by the Supreme Court.

item.title: Full story https://shorturl.
item.description: Full story https://shorturl.at/lKebd || Enough is Enough: President Droupadi Murmu breaks silence on Kolkata horror
